CHAT.comment: JOHN DOE #1, ET AL., Petitioners v. SAM REED, WASHINGTON SECRETARY OF STATE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:11 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES BOPP, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL ROBERT M. McKENNA ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES BOPP, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:08 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
